name: Plantago major

Head: Periodical prosopalgia, worse seven AM to two PM, accompanied with flow of tears, photophobia; pains radiate to temples and lower face
Stool: Wants to defecate; goes often, but cannot
Piles so bad, can hardly stand
Mouth: Teeth ache and are sensitive and sore to touch
Salivation; teeth feel too long; worse, cold air and contract
Toothache, with reflex neuralgia of eyelids
Ears: Neuralgic earache; PAIN GOES FROM ONE EAR TO THE OTHER THROUGH THE HEAD

details: Has considerable clinical reputation in the treatment of earache, toothache, and enuresis. Sharp pain in eyes, reflex from decayed teeth or inflammation of middle ear. Eyeball very tender to touch. Pain plays between teeth and ears. Pyorrhoea alveolaris. Depression and insomnia of chronic Nicotinism. Causes an aversion to tobacco.
dosage: Tincture, and lower potencies. Local use in toothache in hollow teeth, otorrhoea, pruritus, and Poison-oak. Incised wounds.
